name: Superstartrek
tagline: Super startrek revived as an HTML 5 app
body:
### About superstartrek

This is a port of [Super Star Trek](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Super_star_trek#Super_Star_Trek) to mobile phone browsers. This port takes several liberties:

* The UI is directed at touch/click operation and is not command based as in the original game
* Much of the original game's brilliance lies in estimating consumption, damages and distances. In a GUI this doesn't make much sense, hence this port is exploring different ways of diversifying game play
* This is work in progress

### Roadmap

* Winning and losing conditions
* Refueling at starbases
* AI for enemy ships
* Damage model
* Navigation obstruction by obstacles
* ...
